25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Ibn 'Umar from the Prophet (ﷺ) through different chain of narrators to the same effect. In this version he also said:"He who assits in a dispute unjustly deserves the anger of Allah, Most High

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ يُعِينُ عَلَى خُصُومَةٍ مِنْ غَيْرِ أَنْ يَعْلَمَ أَمْرَهَا
chapter.eng-name: Regarding a man who helps someone in a dispute without knowing about the case
